content.detailedDescription: I arrived home about 2 am from poker party, sober. checked status of broiler chicken house and was headed inside when i saw a brightly lighted disc shaped object, about thirty feet across come over a ridge from the east and silently descend to or nearly to the ground behind some timber. i chose not to approach it and went to bed. the next morning i checked and there were no disturbances of foliage, ground that i could find.
content.summary: I saw a brightly lighted disc, about 30 feet diameter come over a ridge and land or hover in my pasture aaabout  quarter mile away.

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my friends house i got on my car it was dark out after i started my car i was looking straight ahead and that's when i seen this green light coming out from the tree tops it shot straight up i thought it was a a roman candle fireworks but i was wanting for more to go up and there was nothing.After driving home and a few hours later i went out side for a smoke and again i for some reason i looked up and seen the same green light it was there and did the same z formation i could see the z pattern left in the sky for 2 seconds then went straight up and disappeared.Im scared for someone to see the same object a few hours apart and 7-8 miles from where you seen the first sighting it makes me feel like it followed me home.I dont understand how something can be in front of you one second and gone the next
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: It was a green light it just appeared and made a z like pattern then took off straight up and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Sitting at outside table at work. it was an awesome sun set. i wanted a pic of it. i seen a bright flash of light and looked up to the sky and seen something going crazy up there. up, down, sideways.  i pointed my phone in its direction and took a pic. when i lowered my phone,  it was gone. i reviewed my pics and to my amazement,  i had it on my phone. looks like it split into 2 different objects.  it left a smoke trail behind. from an eyes point of view,  it looks like a little silver line. the sun was bright and caused it to reflect flashes. i felt good about it. not the first thing i ever seen up there but this time i had a way to photograph it. see what you think.
content.summary: Waiting to start work. seen flash in sun set. raised phone and took pic. caught it on my phone.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my front porch talking with a friend on the cell when i noticed an object with very bright, pulsating blue lights move from e to nw. then it went back and forth a few times which seemed a strange thing to happen so i ended my phone call and started to video it. kelly drove up with dinner right in the middle of this and also saw it. he was concerned i would step in the glass on the sidewalk, sorry for all the talking on the video! i lost sight of the object when an airplane flew close to it. you can see in the video that the blue light goes out right when the airplane comes near. kelly did look for it as he drove towards it but was unable to see anything because of the bright lights from two public parks near our home.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo with blue lights changed directions several times, then hovered, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was looking into the dark night sky pointing out a few things about the stars to my friends son's when i noticed a grey object gliding by.  it was about 50 yards above our heads.  both boys noticed it.  it was in the shave of a v and made no noise..  the "wings" were about the length of a couch and had the width of a football.  as it went by, it had no lights and we lost sight of it in the dark sky. this happened on nov. 13th, 2014.
content.summary: Grey drone?

content.detailedDescription: at 7:40 p.M. i heard an unusually loud helicopter. it sounded really close. my dogs ran to back room, they don't ever run from anything.I rushed outside with digital camera ready to record. i saw what looked like three or four helicopters. i went to the street for a better view and noticed it was two helicopters going slow at about 1/4 mile away and 500 feet in elevation. in the new darkness of the day against the city lights they were less than 100 feet behind an object with no lights. this object was half the size of the helicopters length. i am hoping someone can enhance the video. very hard to see anything but lights.
content.summary: Ufo escorted by two military helicopters -los angeles dark video

content.detailedDescription: I was walking after a long day driving the bus. i hear a whirring sounds and i look up and see a small disc hover.  i then witness it go into hyperdrive and disappear into space. it was about 8:03pm and it was in a bus yard in irvine. i felt excited and curious about the event.
content.summary: Small black disc whirring with blue lifts, disappears into space

content.detailedDescription: I was in my room looking out the window at the stars. i noticed this object that was white, hovering, and wobbling in the sky. i told my boyfriend about it and he said to record it. i got my phone and started recording and then zoomed in and saw more details of the object and also the red lights the was to the left of it in the sky. i then sent it to my boyfriend and he told me to post it on here. i then went outside to see if i could record it again but i tried and tried and couldn't find it in the view.
content.summary: White and red flashing object in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the backyard with the dog, this craft came from the east, moving approx 40 mph very low across the field travelling west. what amazed me was the super bright lights seemed to be mainly in the front of it. it had at first 2 blinking lights, then only 1. i believe the blinking light was blue and red but i was shocked and i'm not sure. the sound was like a high altitude jet sound and another machine type noise. it went right through the radio towers in the field, which planes fly over them,not low.There are heavy cables on them and they are lit up.  this thing reminded me of something you would use to explore dark underwater areas, the super bright white lights were unusual. i have never seen anything like it.
for sure this was not a helicopter or plane. i am upset this thing is right here,  i want to know what they are looking for and what they are up to!
content.summary: Craft with super bright white lights, moving slow and low.

content.detailedDescription:
The attached video best illustrates everything.

basically, i was vacationing in santiago with my cousin, when i noticed a rocket-like light ascend into the sky. at first, i thought it was a rocket but then it became apparent that it was not (i don't think chile has rockets). the light went vertical, high into the sky and then slowly changed directions. this can be noticed by the star in the image. it appeared the light was returning to its earlier position when i first noticed it. it was uneventful except for the fact that the light ascended, slowly moved and then appeared to come back to its original position in the sky.

video submitted with this re-submission. why did it take so long? i had to convert vhs into digital format when i discovered my tapes from that trip. the tapes had been put away in storage.
content.summary: Resubmission: ufo observed ascending change direction santiago chile

content.detailedDescription:
I generally sit outside in my patio and look at the sky and stars and satellites. i am out there anywhere from dusk to around 4:00 am.

over a period of approximately one month, i observed a flash of light that appeared just above the star dubhe in the big dipper several times. at first i thought it may have been a satellite, but it appeared in the same spot (relative to me) at different times ranging from 10:00 pm to 4:00 am. these were single flashes of light. one time i was sitting out in the patio with my brother, where i had previously observed the flashes, and my brother noticed a flash in the same spot. i never told him about my previous observations.

the last observation was in fact kind of scary. i saw the flash of light almost directly north (beneath polaris). this time the light was slightly more yellow. for some reason, i started counting the flashes out loud because there 2, and then 3 and then 4 distinct flashes emanating from the same spot. i felt creeped out because i was looking at that spot just before noticing the flashes, same as the other flashes. i wasn't looking all over the sky. i was just looking at a particular point in the sky and that's where the flashes occurred. 

the flashes appeared as small point-like (star-like) flashes perhaps hundreds of miles from me, in space or low-earth orbit.

no movement was ever observed and nothing came of the flash(es). it very much reminded me of the strobe flashes used in wwii by the air force (raf or usaf) to take photos of the land below. is this going on these days?
content.summary: Observed flashin sky just above the star dubhe over period of one month

content.detailedDescription:
Today i got a letter from my girlfriend in nc.  she said she put my dvd on hold and looked at it with a magnifying glass.  she said she saw a row of orange/pink windows aligning it that could barely be seen.

can i ask mufon for a referral to a ufo expert to analyze my dvd?

thank you.
content.summary: Another update opf cloud ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I worked the third shift in 2005 and had been noticeing a bright star or light in the north east sky when i was leaving for work about 10:00pm so when the weekend came i got out my telescope and thought i would get a close look at what it was. i don`t know my planets and thought it could be venus. i got my telescope set on my porch and i was trying to get the spotter scope set on it when i looked to the east and there was three white lights in the shape of a standing triangle in the sky. it made the hair on my neck stand up because it just felt like i was being watched. i had heard and read alot about abdutions and decided i didn`t want to push my luck so i folded up my telescope and went inside, i looked out about 10 seconds later and the lights were gone.I lived about fifty miles from dayton ohio at the time that this took place.

i had another sighting around 2008, my best friend and i rode together to work, at that time we were working the first shift and we started at 5:00am. we always left early to stop at the vp and have breakfast so we were on the road about 3:45am. we traveled the country roads into town, as as we were heading north we saw a large orange orb in the west sky and we both thought is was the moon, as we came up to a woods that came right up to the road we lost sight of the orb, it took about 10 seconds to pass the woods and when we were past the orb was gone.The orb was very large thats why we thought it was the moon but i don`t think the moon could have moved out of our sight in that short of time.
content.summary: Three white lights in a standing triangle shape

content.detailedDescription: Driving south on i/5,1100 pm.Bright light,showed at top of cascade mt.From east.Grants-pass,or. it followed us so. over mt. shasta, down thru,reding,ca. i got gas in reding, pulled out,so.Bound,it showed its self again,and i flashed it again.4th.Time.It stayed w/us the next 50 miles to corning,ca.We flashed it again,head lights,as we got off the freeway,and on out to the 10 acre walnut orchard.Our house.We had a large creek next to the house. i parked my truck,walked to the side of the house at the creek, and there it was!Hovering no noise,just staying there.My son and i just looked at it for 20 min.It didn't do anything.100 feet in the air,75 to 100 feet in dia.We in and went to sleep.We started our drive from portland,or. after sleeping 4 hours i got up looked outside and it was still there.10;00am.We didn't see it leave as we went to town to get a camera.Got back in 30 min.It was gone.2 hours later i turned on the 12;00 noon news.And there it was.Somebody down the creek had a video camera and captured it. took that to channel 12 news khsl tv,chico, ca debbie cobbe was the reporter. i looked for it again on the 5;00pm news cast. it was gone!I felt really good about the hole deal.It never returned again. that's how it all went down.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Interstate 5 so.Grants pass, org. flash it,5times,it stayed w/us to corning,ca.To house

content.detailedDescription: An hour ago i watched my dvd of the "cloud ufo" i filmed on friday, september 26th, 2014.  i noticed for the first time a bright white light on top and bottom of the object just before it disappeared, and the video ended.  the light shined upward and on the ground. pretty scary.
content.summary: Update on

content.detailedDescription:
sun coming up saw object in west sky looked like a boomerang traveling sw to ne very bright no trail no sound below slight clouds seemed to blink off all light.The speed was approximately 5 times as fast as high flying jet aircraft which i observed a few seconds after.The jets were heading south so i 
don't think there was a persuit going on.I was sitting on my back deck.I noticed the object and thought it might be space debris but the light stayed constant and left no trail or signs of breaking up.The light seemed to turn off this left me scratching my head.Being 68 years of age i have witnessed many shooting stars but this was very different.
content.summary: Bright boomerang object traveling sw to ne no sound very fast

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
i returned from a move late night and was in my balcony as i was not getting sleep. it was about 4- 4:10 am

2. what made you first notice the object?
i was looking at th sky whether is it going to rain, then i noticed that something was seeming to be hovering around.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
initially thought that it may be some dark rainy cloud. but when it started flashing lights i got confused.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
it started few flashes.. and zipped towards my building and canged direction towards south west and flew away. it took only seconds for it to do it.
5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
when i came towards my building i got scared and confused. when it flew back i ran iside to grab my cell phone camera. but it never came back. i waited for more than an hour scanning the skies.
6. how did you lose sight of the object?
it flew away to the south west. and i reside in first floor, and there are taller buildings on the south west side.
content.summary: Saw a dark object hovering in the sky. it suddenly got brighter with some flashlights and flew away.

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving east on interstate 85 near huguley, alabama about 3:00 am on november 2, 2014 a disc shaped craft with two bright tubular shaped lights descended slowly from the west into my view. it hovered over the treetops  along the roadside for a few seconds. i was on a straight portion of the highway with no other traffic and i just stared at the craft. there were no distractions of my view. the white lights were very clear and bright and not blinking. they were side by side on the bottom of the craft and seemed to extend its entire length. i could barely see the craft outline as it hovered because it blended with the night sky. the weather at the time was cool and mild and only partly cloudy with the temperature in the 45 or 50 degree range. after hovering for maybe 5 seconds it ascended into the southeast sky with incredible acceleration and disappeared quickly. its departure was a very quick swooop upwards and i could not tell if it changed direction. i had just eaten breakfast at a waffle house in opelika with my son 15 minutes earlier so i texted him as well as my wife and told them "i just saw a ufo" as i was very much awake and somewhat in shock. i have never experienced a sighting such as this and i will never forget it.
content.summary: Craft with 2 tubular white lights descended, hovered, and quickly sped away

content.detailedDescription:
0515 eastern 11/13/14, arose and went to my backyard and scanned the sky (without visual aid) as i do each morning. this time of year i first seek out orian. extremely clear skies. i saw a very bright object moving left to right (south to north) crossing the center of the constellation near the "belt." then spotted a second, identical bright object following the first, along the same path. the objects were at extreme distance, yet brighter than the stars of orian's belt. once both had cleared the area of the constellation, they both rapidly faded before disappearing entirely. this gave the impression of two objects, far enough away to reflect sunlight or generating a white light of their own, which traveled on a horizontal line, then traveled away (further into space) at extreme speed. i lost sight of the objects as their distance from me increased.
i have seen lighted or reflective objects before dawn, traveling at extreme speeds, appearing to be at extreme distance from me on several ocassions. on four ocassions i have seen such an object make a 90-degree turn without slowing down. i have never seen two at one time until this morning, and i believe they were brighter this time.
i believe, as i have on previous ocassions, that they were intelligently directed technology.
i was neither surprised nor frightened in any way. i simply observed their actions closely. once they were gone, i watched the southwest sky for several minutes, but saw nothing further.
i have no photos or videos
content.summary: Pair of bright lights crossing through contellation orian

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo june 25 1965 philadelphia pa

the ufo report i am making took place in philadelphia on june 25, 1965.
at the time i was eleven years old. i am a retired air force intelligence officer (major), and veteran of the gulf war. 

i was sitting looking out a window when i saw a large bright object descending at a fast rate of speed. it was coming down at a 45% angle at perhaps fifty miles per hour. i thought it was a rocket, because of its shape, a cylinder with rounded ends. i ran and hid behind the couch away from the window. i expected an explosion but heard nothing, so i looked out. i saw the ufo hovering a block down the street over roof tops.

the ufo had descended at 22nd street, descending at the intersection of 22nd and mount vernon street, moving north then stopping at 22nd and wallace street. i was viewing the object from my grandmother and grandfather's 3rd floor apartment window at 643 north 22nd street, philadelphia pa on june 25th 1968.
the ufo followed the outline of all the homes and buildings-opposite my side of the street, including a church. it flew just feet above the roof tops.

it would pause, descend, and rise, hovering about ten feet above all the roof tops. it was as if it was viewing inside the homes. it moved slowly traveling at walking pace.

the ufo was the length of a city bus, with rounded ends, but wider in circumference. it was a large cylinder, it had no markings of any kind, no wings, no visible engines, no windows. the entire surface was made up of a plasma field, like a close up image of the sun. these gases or ions spun and disappeared under the surface, diving and rising like a gas. the brightness was intense. it was composed of several colors, white, yellow and orange. it reminded me of someone mixing giant cans of paint. it was very beautiful but hard on the eyes because of its brilliance. 

at one point i turned around looking behind me into the apartment and noticed the patterns of light also produced shadows on my grandmothers walls. the patterns it produced on the walls were dark with light edges. the patterns matched the moving patterns of the vessel's surface. the only thing i've ever seen similar are close up films of the sun. in addition to the swirling patterns of light i noticed it was layered in a dimple pattern that covered it's entire surface. the dimples appeared to vibrate but stayed in place like those on a basketball while plumes of gas rose and fell like filaments of a magnet. this was truly amazing to see! at times i used my hands to shield my eyes. it was the brightest light i've ever seen and today i'm sixty years old, as of november 2014. i was alone viewing the object. my grandfather was at work and my grandmother went downstairs to another apartment for a short time.

it approached my location stopping directly in front of me. i did not feel any heat. at this point it was about 80 feet away, close enough to throw a ball to it! i was able to observe this object for perhaps five minutes in total, which seemed then to be a long time. as i said it paused several times over apartments, then would move and stop again several times.

just before the ufo changed direction (descending, or rising, stopping or starting to move forward) it emitted a loud sound. the sound always preceded its change in movement by about two seconds each time. so i knew when it was going to move again. the sound reminded me of a loud hiss from an old steam train. i'm not saying there was steam just that the sound was similar to that or when a large truck makes releasing air brakes. 

once the ufo got to the last building at the intersection of 22nd and fairmont streets it angled at 45 degrees, with its front end pointing up, it rose about fifty feet.
 i ran to another window on the side facing wallace street, so was able to watch it again. it leveled off, then flew over the walls of the eastern state penitentiary, it picked up speed at about 35 miles per hour flying north. it continued flying north at a level constant speed until i lost view of it. this craft was definitely controlled by an intelligence. 

when my grandmother came in i told her what i had witnessed. we were both very religious, she had difficulty believing my story and asked me to swear by placing my hand on the bible, which i did. she was convinced and saddened that she had missed this wonderful sight by just minutes.

that evening or perhaps the next night we watched a tv program that highlighted the vessel i had seen and their closer encounter with it. the program was "the arthur godfrey show", or one of his "specials". arthur godfrey was a respected pilot, and was a colonel in the air force reserve. arthur godfrey and frank munciello another experienced pilot were flying in a small aircraft from new york to washington dc. their flight path took them over or near philadelphia on the same day of my encounter. live on national tv author godfrey described that a brilliantly lit vessel followed and maneuvered around his aircraft. he said it matched his course and speed. he admitted he was scared of the vessel's close maneuvers until it finally veered off. arthur godfrey was a well know tv producer and tv host.  his tv program was viewed by millions of americans. my grandparents and i knew he was describing the same vessel i had seen. an account of arthur godfrey's story can be read on ufodocarchiv.Org.

later as an intelligence officer i often gave my squadron current intelligence briefings. i was an intelligence officer of the 732nd military airlift squadron at mcguire air force base in new jersey. i served in this position for approximately ten years, including during the gulf war. during one briefing an aircrew explained to me they encountered a ball lightening encounter, also called saint elmo's fire. a sphere of charged particles entered the airframe of their aircraft while cruising at 40,000 feet. the aircraft was a c-141 starlifter. the sphere about three feet in diameter entered the cockpit then floated inside the aircraft to the cargo bay where it hovered for a time then vanished. they asked of i entered the airframe of their aircraft while cruising at 40,000 feet. the aircraft was a c-141 starlifter. the sphere about three feet in diameter entered the cockpit then floated inside the aircraft to the cargo bay where it hovered for a time then vanished. the entire crew witnesses the sphere and actually enjoyed the event. they asked if i knew of any ufo sightings. i then told them my story. this upset my squadron training officer who verbally reprimanded me, i was ordered to never speak about ufo's again.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large cigar shaped vessel, close encounter, brilliantly lit, rooftop hovering

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were on holiday in crete, greece, and as amateur astronomers, would often lay on sunbeds at night on the roof, and just be.
4 days into our holiday, and with our eyes adapted for at least half an hour, i glanced a shape moving aross the sky, just above one or two tiny puffs of white cloud. other than that the sky was clear.

i said to my husband "what the hell is that?" and he saw clearly, along with myself, a grey, flat or dull surfaced chevron shape.
the leading edge was wide and flat, as if the point of the craft had been cut off. there was a triangular "nick" in the rear end.
there was a dark line around the whole edge, and 3 lines on each side at the rear.
it was big, completely silent, and with no lights whatsoever. it moved gracefully and in a straight line.
we watched transfixed as it went over for around 30 seconds until we lost sight of it over the white mountains.We tried to rationalise it.. the usual suspects, but we couldn't.
 we felt slightly disturbed for a few days afterwards, and i can still see it fresh in my mind to this day. 
my husband was shocked, as it was the first time he has seen a ufo,but as my third sighting, i was a little more accepting.
we carried on looking each night, but alas saw nothing else of note.
content.summary: A grey, silent chevron with no lights/sound, wide flat edge across front.Line marks at edges.

content.detailedDescription: Ok.  so this is the third event i've seen over the last month and a half? at exactly 3 am i go out on my second floor balcony for a smoke. it faces due south with an excellent view of the sky both south and southeast.  there is a regional airport directly to the southeast about 1 mile away of which i have an excellent view, the north/south runway. so, the moment i walk on to the balcony i look to the sky and see what i first take to be the lights of a plane.  it looks like its banking a turn from east to west turning due south. but, as i began to register everything, it was different from a plane. i'm very familiar with the sights and sounds of planes going about their daily routines, from single engine props doing touch-and-go's to jet charters flying in and out.  i know their sounds and heights and speeds.  this just didn't register as a plane after initial notice.  it was completely silent. it moved faster than a plane landing or taking off. and the lights weren't right, for a plane.  while they were visible,they were almost muted? i might say. visible but not bright like a regular light. color i'd say was...Muted light jade?  it all happened so fast even as i'm trying to note things it's getting more difficult to notice and mentally mark what i'm seeing. like after i was like, "was it three lights or four? was there one red one? what exact configuration were the lights, triangle, square, cross-like. so...It was going south parallel to the runway path, seemingly about 1000 yards to the west, and too high for touch-and-go's, then somewhere downrange it moved ninety degrees west.  it's path i mean.  at this point it was hard to see, i had to look slightly away from the object to see it more clearly at night. then i lost it.  the reason i'm filing this report is...This isn't the first time i've seen strange things in the night sky overhead going south, silently. it's the third time.  the first two no "lights" were visible at all, i wondered those times if i'd seen a solitary bird flying at night, but i saw no flapping.  and i would say in all three incidents, height, direction and mostly speed, all were about the same.  i'm not a "ufo" kind of guy. i don't follow "ufo" stuff. also, i know what the space station looks like, like a bright star moving like a satellite. this wasn't that either. eventually, rather quickly really, i just lost sight of it...I just couldn't see it anymore. how i felt when i saw it?? i just thought, "what am i seeing??" that's about it i guess.
content.summary: Saw lights, thought plane, but don't think plane.

content.detailedDescription: I suck at typing so contact me if you want to know, thank you
content.summary: It completely took my breath away, which has never happened in my entire life

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside my house about three weeks ago at night in my back yard a bright light began moving toward me. if i moved, it moved, as if following me every where i walked to.
i saw it a couple of other times, and it did the same thing.
at first i just thought that it was a star.
then last night, i was coming home from a walk and it started to get dark outside. there were no stars in sky except for this starlight object, a bright light as if it were twinkling, and doing some kind of activity.
when i walked down the street i noticed it was above me. so i decided to go back home. it then began to follow me home. it did the same thing tonight. i tried to take a picture of it and my phone cell went dead.
tonight the same thing happened, but i did manage to take a picture of it. i was unable to upload it.
i told two of my neighbors, and they said they saw it too, and how it was following me when i walked away from them.
it seemed to be radiating like a star only was bigger, and very bright with a shadow like figure around it. it also seemed to be twinkling heavily.
it really concerned me when i realized it was following me, and came out more each time i walked. again, my neighbors witnessed this tonight as well.
it always appears at night when i am outside my house.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I noticed ourside my apt. one night a beaming light that began to come closer to me and follow me outside my housel

content.detailedDescription: Ion august 4th at 4:10 pm i was front of my house relaxing on my hammock was looking up to the sky suddenly from north west i saw 3 dots they where black moving to the east  than to the north suddenly another group of dots started moving east they where in line than they moved as making shapes triangles and a square they they got back in line as i called my two neighbors cross the street shawn simpson and brenda told them to look up they did what is it i said don't know than they got back like in line went north west and disappeared in the sky
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I was lying front of my hose look up and noticed like 12 small blac dots moving in line and made different shapes than went back in line and dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: I was driving northbound on the 5 freeway early this morning at approximately 12:23am when i noticed a rather large cigar shaped object with five bright white lights that set horizontally in a row; the lights illuminating the fog above the object. it caught my attention mostly because of the brightness of the lights and its size. my initial thought was that it was a plane, but the object did not appear to be moving. it just seemed to hover there, only a few miles away. i watched it for a moment and then grabbed my phone to take a picture. instead of taking a picture i luckily accidentally recorded a short video. i was able to catch it on the video and screenshot an image.
content.summary: Driving when spotted a large oval shape with five bright lights horizontally in a row illuminating the fog above it

content.detailedDescription:
This was a repeated event that occurred to me from age 8 to 13. it always happened late at night and no one would wake up to hear me cry.  i shared a room with three other siblings, all under the age of 10.  no pets at that time.

i would awaken to a creeped~out feeling, like something was watching me that wanted to hurt me.  my bedroom door would silently open, and then i would hear a soft hissing noise and this 3ft tall, vertical cylinder with a glowing red light approx 3" from the top would hover there, acting like it was studying me.  the light *felt* malevolent; it was a dark red instead of what you would normally expect a light to be.  by this time, i'm terrified and have pulled the covers over my head. i can feel it drift close to me and then i black out.

this would repeat several times a week, more or less, until i turned 13. the last time it showed, i was still terrified but also angry.  as it approached me, i finally became angry enough to mentally shout, "leave me alone!!!! it then disappeared, without me blacking out and to my knowledge has not returned, though i still get the creeped~out feelings occasionally, the most notable being in 1993 while i was living in grand rapids, mi.

has anyone else had an experience like this?  i very much would like some answers.  thanks.
content.summary: It was a dark, gunmetal grey cylinder with a red light hovering vertically in my bedroom.

content.detailedDescription: Camping/fishing on lewis smith lake with two friends. the object appeared just above the top of the ridge across the lake, approx 1/4 mile line of sight. after pausing there for a few moments it descended, coming slowly down the hillside toward the lake in the trees, not above them. we heard no sound.                                                                 we were concerned because it did not appear like a lantern or anything we'd seen before. it's hard to accurately estimate the size but it wasn't large maybe 4-8 feet in dia. it had a defined ball shape. the night was dark and clear, very quiet.                                             we called out and waited for a response which did not come. i fired a rifle into the air, still no response.                                          after a few moments it went back up the hillside, appearing to float and was not impeded by the trees. before it went over the ridge line, it went dark.                                                                                   i have told friends about this but never filed any kind of official report other than this. i never felt i have anything to gain or lose by reporting it. i've read all kinds of bunk about atmospheric/weather phenomena, swamp gas, etc. i'm not sure what this was but i don't think swamp gas is the answer.                                                              after the sighting i spent 20 years in the usaf. i saw a lot of aircraft. including working in the sr-71/u-2 program for 6 years. this was not an aircraft, not the moon, not someone carrying a lantern.
content.summary: Orb appeared at top of ridge across lake, descended into trees, came half way down to lake, paused, reversed direction

content.detailedDescription: It was between 6 and 6:30 am, i parked my car in the uncovered parking lot of the building i worked in at that time. the parking lot is pretty large and i always parked in the same location about 200 ft from the building. i got out of my car, locked it, and started walking toward the rear of my car. at that point lights in the sky caught my attention. as i looked up, i saw a massive black triangle/boomerang shaped object with lights along the edge (all the way around the object). even though it was dark outside, the object was darker. it was moving slowly over my head, as if just cruising. i stopped walking and just stood staring at it. i was mesmerized by the object and quickly came to realize that it didn't make any sound at all! it seemed so close as i could see the object and all the lights clearly. i stood and watched it for about 1 min until it passed over the building i worked in and out of my line of sight.  once it was gone i quickly went into the building and reported the sighting to a coworker. he just laughed at me and said i was having pregnancy induced hallucinations. this was actually the second ufo sighting i witnessed. i realize too much time has passed to investigate, but my thought is that perhaps my story might corroborate another sighting reported at the same time. i no knowledge that mufon even existed until watching a ufo program on t.V.
content.summary: Object flew very slowly overhead. i watched until it passed over a building and left my line of site.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking on the property, looking at the sky when i noticed a light near the sun. at first i wondered if it could be a planet, it was too early in the evening to be a star. but the position of the light was too far away from the ecliptic to be a planet. 

then i noticed a second light, even closer to the sun. they both appeared to be hovering but later they clearly were moving south. by using my thumb in front of me as a guide, i could detect that the light was not moving in a straight line, but rather in a zig zag motion.

i immediately felt like i was witnessing the kind of ufos called "pearls" and also i felt a personal connection to them, like family coming over for a visit. it was loving and peaceful.

many other people observed these same orbs. though they traveled away from the sun, they retained their brightness though some reported that once the sun set, they were no longer visible.
content.summary: White orbs traveling across the sky
